org.merlin.io
Class IOStreamEngine

java.lang.Object
  org.merlin.io.IOStreamEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
OutputEngine
public class IOStreamEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements OutputEngine

An output engine that copies data from an InputStream through a FilterOutputStream to the target OutputStream.
